EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for visiting Pivotal during Strata: The Time for Digital Transformation is Now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for visiting our booth at Strata + Hadoop World 2016! To learn more about how Pivotal can help you develop the right architecture and the right algorithms to power your digital transformation, please join us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Strata+Hadoop-WorldQ116]]>, August 1-4, 2016.
SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process and tools for delivering and operating data-driven software services. Whether you are just starting your transformation journey or already delivering at scale, there will be in-depth advanced technical topics and accessible introductory content covering data analytics, machine learning, microservices, agile, continuous delivery, devops, and more.
Register today <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=Strata+Hadoop-WorldQ116]]>.
We also invite you to take advantage of our library of Big Data and Digital Transformation resources, including:
- Case Study: How O’Reilly Media Uses Pivotal Greenplum for Digital Publishing <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/case-study/enabling-rapid-analysis-of-huge-quantities-of-data-oreilly-media?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign=Strata+Hadoop-WorldQ116]]> - White Paper: Toward Actionable Information by IDC’s Dan Vesset <[[http://pivotal.io/transforming-business-results-with-big-data-and-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=text-link&utm_campaign= Strata+Hadoop-WorldQ116]]> - On-Demand Webinar: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016 <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/your-open-source-playbook-for-2016?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium-text-link&utm_campaign= Strata+Hadoop-WorldQ116]]>
Now is the time to take the reins of your Digital Transformation. Let’s build something meaningful.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
